pr_title: [M] Use dependencyManagement plugin to mange versions (ENT-2029)

timeline.message:
Use dependencyManagement plugin to mange versions
  - Define dependencies with version in the dependencyManagement
  - Remove dependency version value from build.gradle files (root, candlepin and checks projects)

timeline.author: kahowell
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: After removing "com.github.sevntu-checkstyle:sevntu-checks",  checkstyleMain and checkstyleTest tasks are failing.
replies.author: abhiskum

timeline.bodyText: Please remove all but necessary. I suspect only keycloak-servlet-filter-adapter is necessary. I suggest starting with the obviously transitive deps and then removing and seeing if you can still build, until you reach a minimum set.
timeline.author: kahowell
